kpi.name: M8007C13

kpi_info.title: Radio Bearer Release requests including redirect information
kpi_info.use: The number of released Data Radio Bearers due to Radio Network Layer cause Redirect. UPDATED: Transmission of S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message from eNB to MME due to redirect. In this case either RNL cause 'RNL E-UTRAN Generated Reason' or 'RNL Inter-RAT Redirection' are used.

kpi.kpi_alias: Radio Bearer Release requests including redirect information
